text: Godsend is a 2004 supernatural horror-thriller movie. It is about a couple who lose their child, after which they are put through supernatural forces and nightmares. The movie stars Robert De Niro and Rebecca Romijn. This movie received very bad reviews from critics. Its intake was over $30 million, making Godsend a mild success in the box office. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Website for the fictional Godsend institute * * * * Category:2004 thriller movies Category:2004 horror movies Category:2004 fantasy movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:2000s English- language movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Movies directed by Nick Hamm Category:Movies set in Toronto
title: Godsend (movie)
